darkmode-enable-title: You need to accept cookies to enable dark mode
darkmode-enable-desc: You need to consent to cookies to enable the storing of whether you want to disable or enable dark mode on return. All that will be stored on your computer is a bit of data that will tell the website whether you want it on on or off. This is required due to a law of the European Union, called the 'Cookie Law', short for Directive 2009/136, which was amending the Privacy and Electronic Communications Directive 2002/58/EC.
